docs.snippet: The company behind messaging app Snapchat will place its European base in Britain in a vote of confidence in the economy following the vote to leave the European Union....
docs.lead_paragraph: The company behind messaging app Snapchat will place its European base in Britain in a vote of confidence in the economy following the vote to leave the European Union.

headline.main: Messaging App Snapchat to Put European Base in UK

docs.snippet: Social media app Snapchat is introducing video-recording glasses called Spectacles and is changing its company name to incorporate the new product....

docs.snippet: In its latest push to broaden its allure among millennials, Goldman Sachs Group Inc rolled out a series of quick-hit recruiting ads on Snapchat on Friday, becoming the first major Wall Street bank to turn to the instant-but-fleeting messaging app ...
docs.lead_paragraph: In its latest push to broaden its allure among millennials, Goldman Sachs Group Inc rolled out a series of quick-hit recruiting ads on Snapchat on Friday, becoming the first major Wall Street bank to turn to the instant-but-fleeting messaging app for potential hires.

headline.main: Goldman Sachs Taps Snapchat for Recruiting Millennials
headline.print_headline: Goldman Sachs Taps Snapchat for Recruiting Millennials

docs.snippet: It’s easier than ever to plan, troubleshoot and make the most of your trip, with niche-focused apps as well as the old-guard networks....
docs.lead_paragraph: It’s easier than ever to plan, troubleshoot and make the most of your trip, with niche-focused apps as well as the old-guard networks.

headline.main: 5 ways social media can help you travel

docs.snippet: Confronted with an austere version of Islam and strict social codes, they increasingly rely on apps and social media for self-expression and liberation....
docs.lead_paragraph: Confronted with an austere version of Islam and strict social codes, they increasingly rely on apps and social media for self-expression and liberation.
docs.abstract: Saudi Arabian youth have turned to social media as way to circumvent many of the restraints imposed upon them by country's strict social codes and its rigid version of Islam, using apps to earn money, court partners, meet friends and express themselves; country has widely available and reliable Internet, young population and relatively high amount of disposable income, which makes it ideal for social media boom.

headline.main: Young Saudis, Bound by Conservative Strictures, Find Freedom on Their Phones
headline.print_headline: Young Saudis Find Freedom on Smartphones

docs.snippet: Authorities say a photo of money posted on the Snapchat social media app led to a home invasion and robbery in Boca Raton....

headline.main: Deputies: Snapchat Posting of Money Leads to Robbery
headline.print_headline: Deputies: Snapchat Posting of Money Leads to Robbery

headline.main: Snapchat Adds Chat as Messaging Space Heats Up
headline.print_headline: Snapchat Adds Chat as Messaging Space Heats Up

docs.snippet: Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs would help lead the most eagerly awaited new internet stock offering since Twitter....
docs.lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs would help lead the most eagerly awaited new internet stock offering since Twitter.
docs.abstract: Snapchat hires Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs to help with its initial public offering, offering sign that potential stock sale could happen as soon as first quarter of 2017; popular messaging service was recently valued by investors at about $19 billion.

headline.main: Snap Is Said to Pick Bankers for an I.P.O.
headline.print_headline: Snapchat Hires Help for I.P.O., a Prospect Sure to Cheer Wall St.
